attr.title: System Shock
attr.desc: System Shock source port (Shockolate: https://github.com/Interrupt/systemshock) based on the GPL'd Mac sources.
attr.desc_md: System Shock source port ([Shockolate](https://github.com/Interrupt/systemshock)) based on the GPL'd Mac sources.
attr.inst: Copy the contents of the classic edition SSHOCK/DATA/ directory into rel/data/ and run the game.
attr.inst_md: Copy the contents the classic edition SSHOCK/DATA/ directory into rel/data/ and run the game.
